2(a) Use appropriate labelled diagrams to illustrate the following network topologies.
   i Startopology (ii) bustopology (iii) ring topology.
(b) State one advantage of: i Star topology ii Bus topology.
(c) Give one disadvantage of: (i) Bus topology: (i)Ring topology.
correct_answer:
[i] star topology
ii bus topology
iii ring topology
(b)Advantages of:
(i) Star topology:
(a) It is very reliable: if one cable or device fails, all the other devices on the network will still work.
(b) New devices can be added easily yo the network without affecting other devices on the network.(ii) Bus topology:
(a) It is cheap and easy to install, it doesnt require much cable.
(b)  Easy to expand by joining the two cables together.
(c) Disadvantages of:
(i)  Bus topology
(a)Troubleshooting becomes difficult if the whole network goes down.
(b) Additional  devices slow down the network.
(ii) Ring topology
(a) Due to the Uni-directional Ring, a data packet (token) must have to pass through all the nodes.
If one work station shuts down, it affects whole network or if a node goes down entire network goes down.
(b) It is slower in performance as compared to the bus topology.

text:
4[a][i] What is slide master in power point presentation
      [ii] outline the steps to rename the slide master in ms power point
     [b] explain the following features in Ms power point;   
       [i] handout master
       [ii] notes master
correct_answer:
[a][i] In Microsoft power point,the slide master is the top slide that controls all information about the theme,layout,background,color,fonts and positioning of all sides.
Using the slide master is an easy way to adjust the look of an existing theme or make changes to all slides in your presentation.
[ii] The steps to rename the Slide master is Ms Power point:
On the view menu, select master- slide master in the slide thumbnails on the left, select the layout you want to rename.
On the slide master tab, click rename. in the rename layout box,type a new name and then click rename.
b[i]Handout Master
Handout master is used to edit the appearance of presentation handouts ,including the layout,headers and footers and background changes made to the handout master appear on all pages of the printed handout .
[ii]Notes Master
The notes master in ms powerpoint is a feature that allows you to control the settings of the notes section of power point.
it allows you to change layouts,font size,font type,style.and much more, To enable the Notes master in power point click on "view ribbon" and then on" notes master"

text:
A palindrome is a word which can be written in reversed order and it retains its meaning and spelling,Examples are lawal,ada,abba,etc
Write a simple QBASIC instruction that will accept a word from the keyboard and check if it is a palindrome or not. The palindrome must display a message showing if the word is palindrome or not.
correct_answer:
CLS
INPUT-ENTERANY:";S$
For l =LEN(S$) TO 1STEP-1
B$=MID$(S$,L,1)
W$=W$+B$
Next l
IF S$=W$ THEN
PRINT " it is palindrome"
ELSE
PRINT "It is not palindrome
END IF
END
